tool_description: Introducing the Phone Validator API, the perfect solution for businesses looking to verify the accuracy of customer phone numbers. With this API, businesses can ensure that their customer communication efforts are delivered to valid phone numbers, improving the overall customer experience.
name: Phone Validator
title: Phone Validator

api_list.name: Validate Phone
api_list.description: Checks the validity of the phone number and also returns various metadata about the phone number (e.g., carrier info, location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-validator3.p.rapidapi.com/validate_phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-validator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-validator3.p.rapidapi.com/validate_phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-validator3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
